title: No level 40 reward?
body: I leveled up to 40 some 2 days ago and did not get a milestone reward or even a champion capsule. Is this happening to anyone else? I submitted a ticket to see if they can resolve this {{champion:4}}

replies.body: These levelup capsules have been a bit weird over the past few days. Double check your loot now and you should be able to find that level 40 capsule!
